okay for those of you that don't know what to do with the files in the zip, you have two options - you can either mount the bin file or burn it to disc. both of these things can be done using toast (atleast that's what i use). if you have toast, you can just right click on the bin file and then click mount it

Also have Popcorn so no worries if I can't get this to work.

Okay I got it to work.  I just clicked the bin 2 cue icon that has the toast icon on it.  Then it was already on Bin/Cue file at left and then I just hit the burn button and burned it.  Then it opened and I was able to transfer to the apps file.
